dataList.dlg: Absurd. Can't believe I'm relegated to B.S.
Focus on your morning lessons... And don't bother me.
Lunch...? I.D.C. Being out here at this time is a hassle all on its own.
Nighttime, is it... The train will be arriving soon. Finally, something fun.
"Just a cleanup job"...? Ha, this is no mere cleaning. This is a form of art.

Every time I walk through these train doors, vastly different styles of art greet me. This is an opportunity to observe a singular, isolated artistic history that has been molded and honed over thousands of years. Simply electrifying, isn't it?
I should be deployed on a clean-up job, not coddling new hires... Hey, you. Make a complaint to the upper management or something.

Some... Unrefined pieces of art can shamble or even run. Usually a case of multiple passengers being melded into a single body. I must say, that alone is a beautiful sight... It's a shame that they all eventually have to be pulled apart.

My favorite part of this job...? Sure, listen close. It's the fact that, when they took this train of their own volition, every single one of these works of art didn't know what they were signing up for.
Well, maybe it's that they didn't even care to know. Exquisite irony, isn't it?
Hmmm... I'm growing restless. When the hell can we get to work?
Hmph. So you acknowledge my abilities. Then assign me to proper fieldwork, not babysitting.
Finally, fieldwork.
It's time to clean up.
Get out of my way. I'm... in the zone.
Witness my work.
Nearing completion already...
Ha.
The finishing touches.
Hah, this is also... quite avant—garde...
N.P.
S.H.I.T.
That was serviceable. Now, to wait for the next train.
That was quite the exhibition. Perhaps I should thank them for being such a delightful collection of arts?
Dreadful. ...No. I suppose a demotion to L2 would net me more fieldwork.
